title: Latin America Dominates Global Mining Investment Boom
summary: Latin America is catching the eyes of investors worldwide when it comes to mining, as the region has vast critical mineral reserves and low operating costs. summary: Precious metal closes in on $5,000 and silver tops $100 as Trump’s shortlived tariffs threat sparks rush to safe havens

title: Venezuela’s Heavy Oil Gets a Lifeline from US Naphtha

title: U.S. Oil Drillers Add One Rig as Winter Weather Sets In
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States rose by 1 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday, bringing the total rig count in the US to 544 this week, down 32 from this same time last year.
